record_length.comment: number of samples in the acquisition window

block_transfer.comment: number of events to readout at once. Must be smaller than max number of events stored on digitizer. Max 1023

fpio_level.comment: front panel io level. Options are 'ttl' or 'nim'.

events_per_file.comment: number of events per raw data file

is_zle.comment: if the data is zle-encoded or not. yes/no

raw_data_dir.comment: where the data gets written. With trailing '/'

decode_threads.comment: how many threads worth of event decoding you want. 1 is fine for now
